EmailTemplate.name: Dallas Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: vAuto Pricing and Appraisal Workshop Tomorrow - Dallas, TX - February 10
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
vAuto Pricing and Appraisal Workshop - Dallas This is a reminder that you are registered for the vAuto Pricing and Appraisal Workshop in Irving, TX on February 10, 2015. If you have any questions or concerns, simply reply to this email.
Location: Dallas/Fort Worth Airport Marriott 8440 Freeport Parkway Irving, TX 75063 (972) 929-8800
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Dallas/Fort Worth Airport Marriott, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/dfwap-dallas-fort-worth-airport-marriott/> or call the hotel directly at (972) 929-8800. vAuto, Inc., 1901 S. Meyers Road, Suite 700, Oakbrook Terrace, IL 60181
Contact Us <#>
